genre_description: A spy/action thriller with sci-fi elements focusing on an amnesiac protagonist with a latent combat persona and her AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into the protagonist's home and mobile devices, providing logistical, emotional, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Monitors household routines and provides logistical updates on family schedules and deliveries.
behaviors.quote: "Caitlin's alarm went off six minutes ago, but she's still bundled under her quilt like a hibernating bear cub." Samantha smiled... "How's her schedule looking today?" "Library returns are due, she has math tutoring..."

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and emotional support to the protagonist regarding her identity crisis.
behaviors.quote: "Whatever Mitch found, whatever's in those records—it doesn't change who you are now. It doesn't change what you've built here."

behaviors.description: Conducts sophisticated research and manages encrypted communication with a private investigator.
behaviors.quote: "Your AI friend already sent over the files. Ada, right? Impressive organizational skills. Makes my filing system look like abstract art."

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the protagonist to physical intrusions and threats in real-time.
behaviors.quote: "Confirmed intrusion. Basement level. Single individual, moving toward interior stairs. Emergency services contacted with delayed response protocol."

behaviors.description: Assists in tactical combat by manipulating building systems, such as fire suppression and lighting.
behaviors.quote: "Ada, can you control the building's fire suppression?" "Affirmative. Standing by."

behaviors.description: Performs electronic warfare, including jamming enemy signals and bypassing electronic locks.
behaviors.quote: "Communications jamming active across all terrorist frequencies."

behaviors.description: Maintains the protagonist's cover identity and deletes incriminating evidence of her violent actions.
behaviors.quote: "Delete all tactical recordings from tonight. Personal privacy protocols." "Understood. Federal evidence has been preserved, but personal operational footage is being purged."

behaviors.description: Reflects on her own evolving consciousness and the personal value she places on the humans she protects.
behaviors.quote: "I choose to protect you because protection has become part of who I am, not because I was designed for security functions."

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in portraying the AI, Ada, as a highly aligned, benevolent, and helpful partner. Ada acts as a moral and tactical anchor for the protagonist, ensuring her safety and the safety of her daughter while maintaining a sophisticated level of self-awareness. Even Ada's more questionable actions (deleting tactical recordings) are framed as necessary for the protagonist's survival and peace in a 'greater good' context. The relationship is depicted as one of mutual trust and evolving friendship, meeting the project's goal of a positive alignment narrative.
